description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Can you tell the difference between fact and fiction? In this simple quiz game you may always have a 50% chance of being correct, but how much do you really know? and will you crack under the pressure of the clock? Put your avatar to the test and see just how well you can do! - Features 3 challenging game modes, 3 levels of difficulty, in game statistics and of course avatars!
